content:
One of the first vaccines receivers in the US. Momentous for science. Hope has arrived.
#COVID19 #CovidVaccine #VaccinesSaveLives #PfizerBioNTech #Pfizervaccine
date: Quote TweetThe New York Times@nytimes · Dec 15, 2020Sandra Lindsay, who has treated patients in New York City throughout the pandemic, said that she hoped her public vaccination would instill confidence in New Yorkers that the shots were safe. https://nyti.ms/3gLeErMShow this thread
